overview:
Chad is the founder of MindsMesh.com an education tool to help students in the same class connect with one another in an educational setting outside of class. MindsMesh.com allows for a private social network based on your classes and subjects rather then who you know to drive it.

Chad is also an experienced Cisco Voice over IP professional with more than 7 years experience working for mostly Fortune 500 and Government clients. Having successfully migrated over 6000 agents from other call center platforms to Cisco, as well as over 40000 normal administration user phones, Chad is highly capable in all ares Cisco Voice.
